smas.name: SMA {fastLength} {mediumLength} {slowLength}
smas.script:
plotline(sma($price.close, options.fastLength), color=options.fastColor)
plotline(sma($price.close, options.mediumLength), color=options.mediumColor)
plotline(sma($price.close, options.slowLength), color=options.slowColor)

emas.name: EMA {fastLength} {mediumLength} {slowLength}
emas.script:
plotline(ema($price.close, options.fastLength), color=options.fastColor)
plotline(ema($price.close, options.mediumLength), color=options.mediumColor)
plotline(ema($price.close, options.slowLength), color=options.slowColor)

cmas.name: CMA {fastLength} {mediumLength} {slowLength}
cmas.script:
plotline(cma($price.close, options.fastLength), color=options.fastColor)
plotline(cma($price.close, options.mediumLength), color=options.mediumColor)
plotline(cma($price.close, options.slowLength), color=options.slowColor)

ichimoku.script:
conversionLine=(lowest($price.low, options.conversionLineLength) + highest($price.high, options.conversionLineLength)) / 2
baseLine=(lowest($price.low, options.baseLineLength) + highest($price.high, options.baseLineLength)) / 2
leadLineOne=(conversionLine + baseLine) / 2
leadLineTwo=(lowest($price.low, options.laggingSpanTwoLength) + highest($price.high, options.laggingSpanTwoLength)) / 2
plotcloudarea(leadLineTwo, leadLineOne, offset=options.displacement)
ichimoku.name: Ichimoku

bollinger_bands.script:
a = sma(Math.pow($price.close,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum($price.close,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
src = $price.close

basis = sma($price.close, options.length)
dev = options.mult * stdev
upper = basis + dev
lower = basis - dev

plotline(basis, color=options.basisColor)
plotcloudarea(lower, upper)
bollinger_bands.name: Bollinger Bands

bb-ema-ribbon.script:
src = sma($price.close, options.maLength)
a = sma(Math.pow(src,2),options.bbLength)
b = Math.pow(sum(src,options.bbLength),2)/Math.pow(options.bbLength,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
dev = options.mult * stdev
basis = sma(src, options.bbLength)
upper = basis + dev
lower = basis - dev
srcTwo=($price.close + $price.low + $price.high) / 3
emaSlow = ema(srcTwo, options.emaSlowLength)
emaFast = ema(srcTwo, options.emaFastLength)
plotcloudarea(lower, upper, positiveColor=options.slowRibbonColor, negativeColor=options.slowRibbonColor)
plotcloudarea(emaSlow, emaFast)
bb-ema-ribbon.name: Ribbon

vwap.name: VWAP

rsi.script:
src = $price.close
change = src - src[1]
up = ema(Math.max(change, 0), options.length)
down = ema(-Math.min(change, 0), options.length)
rsi = down == 0 ? 100 : up == 0 ? 0 : 100 - (100 / (1 + up / down))
line(80, color=options.thresholdColor)
line(20, color=options.thresholdColor)
line(rsi)
rsi.name: RSI
